title: Ethiopian Greens (Gomen Wat)
ingredients: ['900g kale, rinsed, trimmed and chopped', '475ml water', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '125g chopped onions', '8 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '225g sliced green pepper', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh root ginger']
